biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

Class FileLoadersOptionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.FileLoadersOptionBuilder

  • public class FileLoadersOptionBuilder
extends Object

    Allows to create value of the file loaders option.

    Example code: 

     List<String> fileLoaders;
 // create a list with standard loaders
 fileLoaders = new FileLoadersOptionBuilder().withHttp().withLocal().build();
 
 // create a list with standard loaders (short version)
 fileLoaders = new FileLoadersOptionBuilder().withStandard().build();
 
 // create a list with custom loader
 class CustomFileLoader implements FileLoader {
      // omitted implementation
 }
 
 fileLoaders = new FileLoadersOptionBuilder().withCustom(CustomFileLoader.class).build();
    Since:
    2.0.0
    See Also:
    FileLoader, LessOptions

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileLoadersOptionBuilder()
      Constructs a new instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> build()
      Builds a list with file loaders class names.
      FileLoadersOptionBuilder withClassPath()
      Appends the ClassPathFileLoader at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loader again.
      FileLoadersOptionBuilder withCustom(Class<? extends FileLoader> clazz)
      Appends a custom file loader implementation at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loader again.
      FileLoadersOptionBuilder withFtp()
      Appends the FtpFileLoader at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loader again.
      FileLoadersOptionBuilder withHttp()
      Appends the HttpFileLoader at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loader again.
      FileLoadersOptionBuilder withLocal()
      Appends the LocalFileLoader at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loader again.
      FileLoadersOptionBuilder withStandard()
      Appends standard file loaders at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loaders again.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Appends standard file loaders at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loaders again.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Since:
        2.0.0
        See Also:
        HttpFileLoader, LocalFileLoader

        public FileLoadersOptionBuilder withLocal()

        this builder.
        Since:

      • withFtp

        public FileLoadersOptionBuilder withFtp()

        Appends the FtpFileLoader at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loader again.

        Warning: requires Apache Commons Net library in the classpath.

        Returns:
        this builder.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • withCustom

        public FileLoadersOptionBuilder withCustom(Class<? extends FileLoader> clazz)
        Appends a custom file loader implementation at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loader again.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the custom file loader implementation class.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - is clazz is equal to null.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • build

        public List<String> build()
        Builds a list with file loaders class names.
        Returns:
        the list with class names.
        Since:
